private static void epiAppyAll_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs args) { EpiDataView edv = oTrans.Factory("OrderHed"); string PntColor = edv.dataView[edv.Row]["ShortChar01"].ToString(); edv.dataView[edv.Row]["ShortChar01"]=PntColor; oTrans.Update() ;
int OrderNo = Convert.ToInt32(edv.dataView[edv.Row]["OrderNum"]); int CustNum = Convert.ToInt32(edv.dataView[edv.Row]["CustNum"]);
if (PntColor != "") {
oTrans.PushStatusText("Wait Updating...", false);
CallApplyallDynamicQuery(OrderNo,CustNum, PntColor);
oTrans.PushStatusText("", false); Cursor.Current = Cursors.Default; } }
private static void CallApplyallDynamicQuery(int OrderNo, int CustNum, string PntColor) { try { // Declare and Initialize EpiDataView Variables // Declare and create an instance of the Adapter. DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect();
Cursor.Current = Cursors.WaitCursor;
// Declare and create an instance of the Adapter. SalesOrderAdapter adapterSalesOrder = new SalesOrderAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterSalesOrder.BOConnect();
string OrderN = OrderNo.ToString(); string BAQName = "Order_PaintablePartQRY"; Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("OrderNum", OrderN, "int", false, Guid.Empty, "A");
// Call Adapter method adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(BAQName, ds);
System.Data.DataSet dsSalesOrder = adapterSalesOrder.GetData(OrderNo);
// Lets Loop through our results if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0) {
foreach (DataRow Qry in adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows) {
string OrderPart = Qry["Part_PartNum"].ToString(); int OrderLn = Convert.ToInt32(Qry["OrderDtl_OrderLine"]); bool Paintable = Convert.ToBoolean(Qry["Part_CheckBox01"]);
if (dsSalesOrder != null) {
foreach (DataRow item in dsSalesOrder.Tables["OrderDtl"].Rows)
{ if (item["PartNum"].ToString() == OrderPart && Convert.ToInt32(item["OrderLine"]) == OrderLn ) {
item.BeginEdit(); item["CheckBox01"] = Paintable; item["ShortChar02"] = PntColor; item["RowMod"] ="U"; item. EndEdit(); }
}
}
} }
adapterSalesOrder.Update();
oTrans.Refresh() ; adapterSalesOrder.Dispose();
Cursor.Current = Cursors.Default;
adapterDynamicQuery.Dispose();
} catch (System.Exception ex) { ExceptionBox.Show(ex); } }
private static void epiPntMtl_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs args) { EpiDataView edv = oTrans.Factory("OrderHed"); string PntColor = edv.dataView[edv.Row]["ShortChar01"].ToString();
int OrderNo = Convert.ToInt32(edv.dataView[edv.Row]["OrderNum"]); int CustNum = Convert.ToInt32(edv.dataView[edv.Row]["CustNum"]);
if (PntColor != "") {
oTrans.PushStatusText("Wait Updating...", false); CallSalesOrderAdapterGetNewOrderDtlMethod(OrderNo, CustNum); oTrans.PushStatusText("", false);
}
}
private static void CallSalesOrderAdapterGetNewOrderDtlMethod(int OrderNum, int CustNum) { try {
SalesOrderAdapter adapterSalesOrder = new SalesOrderAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterSalesOrder.BOConnect();
DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect();
string BAQName;
//Get customer information
string CustNo = CustNum.ToString(); BAQName = "CustomerQuoteINFO";
Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds1 = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
ds1.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("CustNum", CustNo, "int", false, Guid.Empty, "A"); adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(BAQName, ds1);
if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0) { foreach (DataRow Cust in adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows) { CustomerCustID = Convert.ToInt32(Cust["Customer_CustID"]); TerritoryID = Cust["Customer_TerritoryID"].ToString(); CustomerName = Cust["Customer_Name"].ToString(); QuoteNumCurrencyCode ="USD"; TerritoryIDTerritoryDesc = Cust["SalesTer_TerritoryDesc"].ToString(); DiscountPercent = Cust["Customer_DiscountPercent"].ToString();
} }
//============================================ //Select all the paint material for the order
string OrderNo = OrderNum.ToString(); BAQName = "Order_PaintPartNum4";//Order_PaintPartNum4
Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds2 = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
ds2.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("OrderNum", OrderNo, "string", false, Guid.Empty, "A");

private static void CallDynamicQueryPainLn(int OrderNum, int CustNum, string PntColor, int DisplaySeq) { try { Cursor.Current = Cursors.WaitCursor;
// EpiDataView edv = oTrans.Factory("QuoteDtl");
SalesOrderAdapter adapterSalesOrder = new SalesOrderAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterSalesOrder.BOConnect();
DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect();
int MinSeq = DisplaySeq; int MaxSeq = DisplaySeq + 1; string LineN = DisplaySeq.ToString(); string OrderN = OrderNum.ToString(); string BAQName = "PaintablePartLine_Order"; Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();
ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("OrderNum", OrderN, "int", false, Guid.Empty, "A");
ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("LineSeq", LineN, "int", false, Guid.Empty, "A");
// Call Adapter method adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(BAQName, ds);
System.Data.DataSet dsSalesOrder = adapterSalesOrder.GetData(OrderNum);
// Lets Loop through our results if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0) {
foreach (DataRow Qry in adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows) {
string OrderPart = Qry["Part_PartNum"].ToString(); int OrderLn = Convert.ToInt32(Qry["OrderDtl_OrderLine"]); bool Paintable = Convert.ToBoolean(Qry["Part_CheckBox01"]); int LnSeq = Convert.ToInt32(Qry["OrderDtl_DisplaySeq"]);
if (dsSalesOrder != null) { foreach (DataRow dr in dsSalesOrder.Tables["OrderDtl"].Rows) { if (dr["PartNum"].ToString() == OrderPart && Convert.ToInt32(dr["OrderLine"]) == OrderLn && Convert.ToInt32(dr["DisplaySeq"])== LnSeq ) { //MessageBox.Show(OrderPart); dr.BeginEdit(); dr["CheckBox01"] = true; dr["ShortChar02"] = PntColor; dr["RowMod"] ="U"; dr.EndEdit(); adapterSalesOrder.Update();
} }
}
} }
oTrans.Refresh() ; adapterDynamicQuery.Dispose(); adapterSalesOrder.Dispose();
Cursor.Current = Cursors.Default;
} catch (System.Exception ex) { ExceptionBox.Show(ex); } }
private static void CallSalesOrderAdapterGetNewOHOrderMscMethod(int orderNum, int orderLine , double FtCost ) { try {
SalesOrderAdapter adapterSalesOrder = new SalesOrderAdapter(Script.oTrans); adapterSalesOrder.BOConnect();
// Call Adapter method bool result4 = adapterSalesOrder.GetByID(orderNum); bool result = adapterSalesOrder.GetNewOHOrderMsc(orderNum, orderLine); if (result) {
DataRow dr = adapterSalesOrder.SalesOrderData.OHOrderMsc[adapterSalesOrder.SalesOrderData.OHOrderMsc.Rows.Count - 1];
dr["Company"] = "19289"; dr["OrderNum"] = orderNum; dr["OrderLine"] = 0; // dr["SeqNum"] = 1;
dr["CurrencySwitch"] = false;
dr["MiscCode"] = "FRT"; dr["Description"] = "Freight Charge"; dr["MiscAmt"] = FtCost; dr["DocMiscAmt"] = FtCost ; dr["FreqCode"] = "L"; dr["Type"] = "A"; dr["DspMiscAmt"] = FtCost; dr["DocDspMiscAmt"] = FtCost; dr["MiscCodeDescription"] = "Freight Charge";
dr["CurrencyCode"] = "USD"; dr["RowMod"] = "A"; adapterSalesOrder.Update();
} oTrans.Refresh() ;
// Cleanup Adapter Reference adapterSalesOrder.Dispose();
} catch (System.Exception ex) { ExceptionBox.Show(ex); } }
